paragraph.paragraph: The C Output tool is where C compilation output is shown.
If the C compiler uses a different locale than your default locale, you can select that particular locale in the "Locale" region.

heading.content: Open a file mentioned in the C output

paragraph.paragraph:
You can open a file mentioned in the C output in a specified external editor by selecting the file name and then clicking the
../../../../images/eiffelstudio/metrics_tool/command_send_to_external_editor_icon.png C output tool
button highlighted in the following figure:

heading.content: Find C code for a class/feature

paragraph.paragraph:
Pick the class or feature whose related C code you want to see and drop it into the
../../../../images/eiffelstudio/c_output_tool/coutput4.png C output tool button or the
../../../../images/eiffelstudio/c_output_tool/coutput5.png C output tool
button. The related C code will be shown in specified editor.
